attributes.action: Demand for an early election, vote of no confidence
attributes.additional_details: We as British citizens demand an early election. This is due to a rapidly growing vote of no confidence within the UK. Lately, Mr Cameron decided to go on holiday after the injustice in Woolwich. Drummer Rigby was meant to be going home to see his family. A family he will never see again, a family who will never see their son, brother, husband, dad, partner
